Get Test Drug Classes

Source: R/x_get_test.R
get_test_drug_classes.Rd

Get random records of ATC and HemOnc Drug Classes that are:

  1. Valid,

  2. Class,

  3. Belong to the Drug domain

get_test_drug_classes(
  conn,
  conn_fun = "connectAthena()",
  schema = "omop_vocabulary",
  limit = 100,
  verbose = TRUE,
  render_sql = TRUE
)

See also

parse_expr render

Examples

library(chariot)
library(tidyverse)

# Get Unfiltered Test Concepts (Invalid Concepts are included)
get_test_concepts()

# Concepts specific to the Drug domain can be sampled
# RxNorm/RxNorm Extension Concepts
get_test_drug_concepts(limit = 10)

#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-04-23 19:24:40]	Overriding cache... Querying Athena...

# HemOnc/ATC Classes
get_test_drug_classes(limit = 10)

#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-04-23 19:24:44]	Overriding cache... Querying Athena...
#> [2021-04-23 19:24:44] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2021-04-23 19:24:44] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2021-04-23 19:24:44]	SQL: SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept c WHERE c.invalid_reason IS NULL AND c.vocabulary_id IN ('ATC', 'HemOnc') AND c.standard_concept = 'C' AND c.domain_id = 'Drug' ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10

# Test data can also be taken from tables other than Concept
